product_name: The North Face Cotinga Striped Crew Shirt - Men's
long_description: A casual pullover for everyday wear, The North Face Cotinga Striped crew shirt has a soft fabric blend to keep you comfortable as you cruise around town in style. Soft blend of polyester, cotton and modal dries quickly to keep you comfortable all day long.
short_description: A casual pullover for everyday wear, The North Face Cotinga Striped crew shirt has a soft fabric blend to keep you comfortable as you cruise around town in style.
